title: For Some Reason
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Sorry, Ruby-chan! I told you to come all the way here, but Maru just found out that she has to help out with an event at the temple......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>I see...... It is what it is. Do your best then, Hanamaru-chan. We can hang out again tomorrow.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yeah, of course, tomorrow!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Phew, I’m exhausted...... I even had to weed the temple garden. That was grueling, zura...... Huh? Whaaat!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Oh, it’s Hanamaru-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Don’t just go, “Oh, it’s Hanamaru-chan”! Why are you here, Ruby-chan!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>I had nothing else to do, and I wanted to wait for you, Hanamaru-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>And you waited here for four hours!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>What!? Really!? I didn’t realize it at all because I was reading a book...... I bought the digital version of the book you recommended to me, Hanamaru-chan, and read it on my phone~ It was so good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>That mystery book?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah! I didn’t think that person would be the culprit all along. And that scene at the temple in the middle of the book......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>I know, right? Ruby-chan, let’s talk about it more in Maru’s room!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Sure!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
